comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
There are probably a few whimsical costume references I can't spy or understand in this photograph, but like others in this series, there's always something.

The one I've spotted is that the bloke on the right's fob watch chain is actually a bicycle chain.  Only visible on zoom function at the persistent URL.
